title: How to Add an MP3 to Facebook

steps.title: Open the web browser of your choice.
steps.content: Open the web browser of your choice. The most updated is recommended.

steps.title: Go to website.
steps.content: Go to website. Type or copy and paste the following link into your address bar: https://www.facebook.com/appcenter/soundcloud

steps.title: Sign up for SoundCloud.
steps.content: Sign up for SoundCloud. At the top left of the page, you will see an orange button labeled “Sign up for SoundCloud”; click that button. This should open a pop-up window. If it does not, please ensure your pop-up blocker off temporarily.

steps.title: Sign in with Facebook.
steps.content: Sign in with Facebook. On the pop-up window, press the button at the top left of the page labeled “Sign in with Facebook.” On the next window, press the button at the bottom of the page that is labeled “Okay.”

steps.title: Check “Agree to the Terms,” and then push “Sign up.
steps.content: Check “Agree to the Terms,” and then push “Sign up. ” Agreeing to the SoundCloud terms of service is required for registration. Now a page will appear that asks you about your musical preference. Follow the directions provided, then press the button “X” that is hidden at the top right of the page.

steps.title: Search for a song of your choice.
steps.content: Search for a song of your choice.

steps.title: Share.
steps.content: Share. After choosing a song, underneath the song title, there is an icon that allows you to share to Facebook. Hover your mouse pointer over the buttons. A pop-up telling you what the button does will appear. Make sure you press the share button.

steps.title: Go to YouTube website.
steps.content: Go to YouTube website. Navigate to the following link in your preferred internet browser: https://www.youtube.com/

steps.title: Search for your favorite song/music video.
steps.content: Search for your favorite song/music video. Use the search bar located at the top of the page. Press enter to run the query.

steps.title: Copy the link.
steps.content: Copy the link. After clicking on your video, copy the contents in the address bar to your clipboard ([CTRL] + [C]).

steps.title: Log in to Facebook.
steps.content: Log in to Facebook. Navigate to the following link and log in: https://www.facebook.com

steps.title: Post a new status.
steps.content: Post a new status. Post a status using the address/link you copied early as the body. Facebook will automatically pull the video.
